simple Main\+Window class implementation with frameless window and custom dark style.

It adds also support for titlebar and buttons (minimize, maximize, close)

Look is based on the V\+S2013 application window (flat and frameless window)

\subsection*{Qt and OS}


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item tested with Qt5.\+5.\+0, Qt5.\+9.\+0 and Qt5.\+10.\+0
\item tested on Windows 7, Windows 10,Mac\+O\+SX 10.\+12.\+5 and Mac\+OS 10.\+13.\+2
\end{DoxyItemize}

\subsection*{Py\+Qt5}

Here is an \href{https://github.com/gmarull/qtmodern}{\texttt{ unofficial Python port}} of my implementation.

\subsection*{How to use}


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item add additional include plath to {\bfseries{framelesswindow}}
\item add resources {\bfseries{framelesswindow.\+qrc}} and {\bfseries{darkstyle.\+qrc}}
\item add {\ttfamily \#include \char`\"{}framelesswindow.\+h\char`\"{}} into {\bfseries{main.\+cpp}}, create window {\ttfamily Frameless\+Window frameless\+Window;} and assign your mainwindow object as content {\ttfamily frameless\+Window.\+set\+Content(main\+Window);} and show it {\ttfamily frameless\+Window.\+show();}
\item add {\ttfamily \#include \char`\"{}\+Dark\+Style.\+h\char`\"{}} into {\bfseries{main.\+cpp}} and call {\ttfamily a.\+set\+Style(new Dark\+Style);}
\end{DoxyItemize}


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{\#include <QApplication>}
\DoxyCodeLine{\#include "DarkStyle.h"}
\DoxyCodeLine{\#include "framelesswindow.h"}
\DoxyCodeLine{\#include "mainwindow.h"}
\DoxyCodeLine{}

\DoxyCodeLine{\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{  QApplication a(argc, argv);}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{  // style our application with custom dark style}
\DoxyCodeLine{  a.setStyle(new DarkStyle);}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{  // create frameless window (and set windowState or title)}
\DoxyCodeLine{  FramelessWindow framelessWindow;}

\DoxyCodeLine{  //framelessWindow.setWindowTitle("test title");}
\DoxyCodeLine{  //framelessWindow.setWindowIcon(a.style()->standardIcon(QStyle::SP\_DesktopIcon));}
\DoxyCodeLine{  }
\DoxyCodeLine{  // create our mainwindow instance}
\DoxyCodeLine{  MainWindow *mainWindow = new MainWindow;}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{  // add the mainwindow to our custom frameless window}
\DoxyCodeLine{  framelessWindow.setContent(mainWindow);}
\DoxyCodeLine{  framelessWindow.show();}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{  return a.exec();}
\DoxyCodeLine{\}}
\end{DoxyCode}


\subsection*{features}


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item frameless window
\item custom dark style (based on {\bfseries{Fusion style}} with dark palette and custom stylesheets)
\item title bar
\item buttons (minimize $\vert$ restore $\vert$ maximize $\vert$ close)
\item move window by drag the title bar
\item dobule click title bar to toggle between window styte (maximize and normal)
\item use of native events, like minimizing or system menu
\end{DoxyItemize}
